website_summaries.verdict: Based on the epic crossover of Star Wars and Angry Birds, families will enjoy taking down the Imperial Walker in a Jenga-like game as Luke Skywalker-Red Bird.
pros: Walker is easy to set up

customer_reviews.title: Death Star is the better one to buy
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr old son had the Death Star version of this game first and spends hour playing with it. We were hoping for the same with this version, but no luck. It has to be set up manual with no guide and 4 out of 5 times it falls over before he even gets the set up complete. He has now ditched the original set up and just creates his own, so it's not a totally lost. I would definitely recommend the Death Star version over this one for those looking to buy.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Played for Hours
customer_reviews.text: My son and I had a lot of fun playing with this Angry birds set. It takes skills so we took our time learning how to aim properly. I just wish it came with a box or bag to put the pieces away after playing. We just bought one at the dollar store, not a huge deal. I would recommend to any star wars and/or angry birds fans.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fun Star Wars / Angry Birds combo
customer_reviews.text: Kids are having fun with this item but the quality could be better. The painted figures of the birds and pigs are really sloppy and the head of the At-At is way heavier than needs to be, making balancing it tricky even for my very savvy builder. Glad I didn't pay full retail price for this one. The plus is there's lots of pieces to work with, several characters and the catapult works well.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Angry birds and Star Wars together are the best thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.author: Viri Ingham

customer_reviews.title: Sir, imperial walker approaching... Aim for the legs.
customer_reviews.text: There is only one bad thing about this toy... hit one leg and the At-At will fall, well... that's not really bad at all, you must hit the leg for that to happen... aim for the leg... try again... I know you can do it... Keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Otzen Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, lots of pieces, not for kids 3 or under
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo loves this, it takes him longer to set it up then to knock them down. We set it up about a foot away from the wall so the shooters don't roll around and under furniture. My only gripe would be that the figures are a little small and definitely not for any children that still put objects in their mouths.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Cleary

customer_reviews.title: A fun Angry Bird experience
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit time consuming to assembly but really fun to take out with the bird launcher. My daughter has been playing with it non stop. Consequently (although she has no idea as of yet) has learned a bit about physics. Mass, force, speed, distance and time. Geometry, shapes, and angles. Not bad. Oh yeah, she's having lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good present
customer_reviews.text: My son's good friend likes angry bird very much! And this is Christmas gift for him. He loved this very very very much!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Fun game that can teach basic physics
customer_reviews.text: Great game to play with your kids! Although it seems like a simple catapault game, it does teach kids about balancing building blocks and angles to catapault the birds towards the structures you build. And you've gotta love the star wars characters!
customer_reviews.author: Ling

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: My son like this. I find it frustrating at times. It’s great that you can build how you like but at times I feel like I’m playing Jenga in reverse.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Happy little boy gift.
customer_reviews.text: It was our grandson’s favorite gift. I don’t know about the breakdown of elements, but it made a little boy very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Kids like angry birds.....
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids loved it...bought the groups pack of birds to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dotdot

customer_reviews.title: A toy the kid can play by himself.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's Christmas and he played all day. By HIMSELF. No Legos for Dad to put together. Normally when he visits he needs to go to the park or exercise in the gym. Not today. Not too many pieces and very simple to understand. He is eight.
customer_reviews.author: IMAGINE

customer_reviews.title: Grandson thinks it is great
customer_reviews.text: My grandson purchased this himself by using money he earned in a garage sale and he thinks it is great. My only suggestions would be to make the box different. He doesn't want to get a tote for the pieces so if the box was made with a bottom and then a top that slid over then it would be more stable. So even though I know the product is good he is 5 years old and wants it in the original box and with the box closing on the ends it will be easier for the box to open while carrying it and thus loosing the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kdskandles

customer_reviews.title: Great set with many characters included!
customer_reviews.text: Great set to add to my little one's collection. The birds are too small but the set is fun and it includes several characters. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Niche17

customer_reviews.title: Parents worse nighmare, but fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this is a great game, with colorful detailed angry bird Star Wars characters. My son loves it ...BUT ...parents have to put the pieces of the AT-AT together over and over and over and over again .... which gets ..... ugh, you know ... crazy!!! Kids loves launching the angry birds at darth vader & storm troopers and knocking them down ... and they love doing it again and again. I feel bad giving it 3 stars .... but its a personal. :)
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Save you money!
customer_reviews.text: Way over priced for a box of plastic pie es. Difficult to assemble , falls apart while assembling, instructions are a joke, no grooves for main pieces to stabilize. My grandson was so frustrated and disappointed. I was busted angry I spent $22.00 . Get Legos instead, this toy is nothing but frustrating for child and parent.
customer_reviews.author: POLISH

customer_reviews.title: ... wars and angry bird fans and this is a nice combination of the two
customer_reviews.text: My kids are big star wars and angry bird fans and this is a nice combination of the two. Santa brought this and they have both been playing with it pretty consistently ever since. I found this a lot easier for them to play with than some of the previous angry bird sets that I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: SanClementeJedi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these!! Good quality and the kids enjoy them!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Everything we expected
customer_reviews.text: The package was delivered in great condition. Opening it up on Christmas morning, we found everything as we expected. While some reviews have complained of a difficult set up, I found it surprisingly easy to set it up with my son. Admittedly it does fall down easily, but with angry birds, that is somewhat the point, and my son found that enjoyable. This set also has a massive number of birds and pigs to add to your collection, which makes it worth the price in itself. A good set overall.
customer_reviews.author: pete0714

customer_reviews.title: very unstable..1 hit takes it down
customer_reviews.text: We got this and the Jenga death star. My 4&6 yr old boys play with it. Its very unstable and hard for them to put together and falls down easily. I grew tired of rebuilding it every 3-4 minutes. The death Star is MUCH better....requires more hits to take it down and has a useable map. Cute concept though
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Good fun.
customer_reviews.text: Fun for all ages for star wars and angry bird fans.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars and Angry Birds....fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it. Not a ton of replay value but every so often he'll play around with it. Though setting it up just right feels like a game of Jenga, it is tough to get everything perfect without knocking the whole thing over.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Son loved it
customer_reviews.text: My son was thrilled to get this for Christmas. But I think he quickly got tired to having to rebuild the whole thing. All the pieces kind of balance together and if you bump it while building you have to start all over again. He had fun with it but I notice after the first few days I haven't seen it out of the box since. Too much set up - over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old's new favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: HUGE hit with our 4.5 year old. It's hard for us to find toys that hold his interest. This one's a big win! Photo attached is my view for the past 30 minutes :-)
customer_reviews.author: atcolburn

customer_reviews.title: Grandson enjoyed thoroughly!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for our grandson. He was thrilled to receive it and loved it. At three years he has beaten the PC games of Angry Birds and is enthralled by anything having to do with them!
customer_reviews.author: Tom St Clair

customer_reviews.title: fun toy in concept but a pain to set up
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old got tired of this quick, it's difficult to put together and get ready to play. the kids were all fighting over this toy at first and while one was quietly putting this toy together, one would knock into the table and knock the whole thing over, it is more delicate than jenga and not worth all the effort in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Fun - Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This game was more novelty for my 9 year old. I think he lived the way it looked more than playing it. Could be my child though. He would rather be on computer. It is very well made and other kids that come over like to play it. Great price. Quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B

customer_reviews.title: Gets boring relatively quickly but fun for awhile
customer_reviews.text: There's not much to this game and its overpriced, nevertheless my kid loves it so what can you do :) ... a month later though and its no longer played with. Seriously, how can a game this simplistic and without variety hold a child's attention?! Not long! But for a few weeks it was his favorite toy! So depending on your kid(s) you make want it.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and good quality, my daughter liked it thank you
customer_reviews.author: ProEasyLife

customer_reviews.title: Too many pieces...
customer_reviews.text: ...so we ended up gluing some of them together for the boys. They liked it better, when they could rebuild it (somewhat) themselves. Of course, they love anything Angry Bird. But this is a little flimsy for kids to do on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Seablue2u

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy, quality not quite up to par
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised, but in my opinion the quality of the plastic is a bit more flimsy than I expected. It certainly takes some time and balance to set up to knock it down, but the launcher is very good quality with the objects, and is quite a bit of fun to work the angles in real life, rather than on a screen. Pleased that we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: ChristiL

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, a toy that makes work.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put set together. Also, it gets really boring to set up again, and again, and again. Was played with on two separate occasions since Christmas and was just messy. Kids sort of enjoyed it, but not as much as video game. Buy outdoor equipment instead to get kids off of video games.
customer_reviews.author: Kristofer Nilsen

customer_reviews.title: Best of both worlds, but
customer_reviews.text: The birds fade quickly. We've bought several of these sets for our son who is a HUGE AB and SW fan. Unfortunately, the paint (?) of the birds/pigs does not stand up very well and is almost completely faded from all of them. Bummer, but still a functioning set.
customer_reviews.author: LetiPaige

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew absolutely loves this toy!! He plays with it all the time. A total winner!!
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Kids Enjoy It
customer_reviews.text: My boys love Angry Birds Star Wars anything, and this is no exception. They do not rebuild the at-at ever, they simply design some sort of structure then throw birds at it. The large flat plate is a bit tricky to balance on, but its still a fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew for Christmas. He loves Angry birds and Star Wars- The design is awesome- love the At-At! Took a little time to set up but, he plays with it non stop.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Lee

customer_reviews.title: Was fun!
customer_reviews.text: Was a fun toy to play a couple time, but it is a little hard to stack and balance to begin your game. So the fun part wore down quick as it was destroyed a lot faster then built. Still fun though if your kids like blowing stuff up. Most boys do :)
customer_reviews.author: Scaldera

customer_reviews.title: Love it. TOTALLY Cool.
customer_reviews.text: My boy says this toy rocks and we are giving it FIVE STARS. The AT-AT is cool and fun to build and knock over. If your kid has enjoyed the other Angry Bird building block fling shot style games then they will love this one. It comes with lots of neat AB Star Wars birds and pigs. May The Force Be With You on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Murphy

customer_reviews.title: A gift for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: He seems to like it, but it's a bit on the "cheaply-made" side. It's a burden to rebuild because it's not very stable (especially on the carpeted floor). If played on the table for stability, the pieces fly all over the floor(of course).
customer_reviews.author: Marsha J.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: lots of small pieces hard for top pieces to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: James Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great rubber birds, too cheap on rest of game.
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, but too cheaply made, minus the fantastic rubber birds. I'd like to see this as a larger yard toy, with balsa wood blocks and racket ball type birds.
customer_reviews.author: cole

customer_reviews.title: my 4 year old would not stop playing with tis ...
customer_reviews.text: my 4 year old would not stop playing with tis for weeks. But he kept making me assemble it so he could destroy it. be patient!
customer_reviews.author: DaveAbdallah

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Hit
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved it - it was the one present he wanted to open right after unwrapping it. He then played with it for hours, just the setting up of the At At takes a while, so it is good for the kid who likes building and angry bird-ing.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! It's easy to set up and the launcher is great since the birds attach to it. It's nicely detailed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love all the little pieces, very detailed. My nephew will love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: The birds how ever look great. My 4yr old likes the game but not ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth 20$ cheap plastic. The birds how ever look great. My 4yr old likes the game but not worth 20$
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great Christmas buy for my 7 y.o. nephew. I didn't know what to buy him and this fit the bill to a T. He loved it. Only downside was the tedium of putting it together but it was a hit for more than a few minutes!
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old birthday gift success
customer_reviews.text: this was a birthday gift for a 4 year old and he asks to play it almost every day. It's been 2 weeks now so this is a major win choice for a birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth a look?
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old has a great imagination and while he was, at first, frustrated with getting this to stand up on carpet, he really enoyed the toy. Its really funny; was fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca U.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son loves it and I think it's super cute. Also bought this as a gift for a friend's son. I would have bought more for family members but the price increased from around $35 to $60, 60 is way too much for it though.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Super entertaining...for 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Christmas and he totally loves it. But the constant putting it back together just to knock it down is a little tedious...especially because I'm the one who does it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L.

customer_reviews.title: Product received early as promised.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was really happy with the arrival of his Christmas gift a day early
customer_reviews.author: Man Hin Lok

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a pain to set up but good overall.
customer_reviews.text: The platform doesn't sit stable on the legs unless you have them in a good spot so I have to be the one to set it up. Overall, it is a good toy and the kids have a ton of fun knocking it all down.
customer_reviews.author: Tracee

customer_reviews.title: Nephew likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I would love to say he loves it but he just likes it. Kid is spoiled and has a lot and that could be the problem. I think my 4 year old LOVES this and I may have to order him one. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mom4Life

customer_reviews.title: For any fan
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandsons--they are die-hard angry bird fans and they have played for hours with this set!! They do all sorts of creative play besides how the game is intended :)
customer_reviews.author: Marmalade

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for Angry Bird fans
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while back and my 10year old grandson still enjoys playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Guy T.

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it. It was a lightning deal that my ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. It was a lightning deal that my kids are benefiting from to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: S & J O.

customer_reviews.title: I love what i bought from Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: The item was what i expected.. great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Dinah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good seller. The order came on time and excellent quality. recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vitaliy Melnik

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves this!
customer_reviews.text: On special request from my grandson for his birthday. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Terrafirma

customer_reviews.title: my kids and I love this toy it provides hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Awsome, my kids and I love this toy it provides hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Falls apart too easy and easy to loose all the pieces
customer_reviews.author: MN GopherFan

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened it today for Christmas, and my son hasn't stopped playing with it! It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Pieces to Get Lost
customer_reviews.text: Too many pieces. Hard to keep them all in the box once you open it up and build it. The kids played it for a few minutes and then lost interest.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyG27560

customer_reviews.title: This Game Reeks
customer_reviews.text: My boy begged for this game. Played with it for about 15 minutes on Christmas morning and hasn't looked at it again. What does it do ? He loves these birds. Like many parents... I don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Build, Demolish, Repeat!!  Kids love this!!
customer_reviews.text: These Angry Birds Star Wars sets are so much fun. Our kids love playing with these whether together or alone. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: mimi k.

customer_reviews.title: Angry Birds Star Wars AT-AT Attack Battle Game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battle game for my grandson. He loves Angry Birds! He loved playing with this toy! He couldn't wait to open this toy to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Brinson

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: very well, nice desing, it's for anyone, easy to use, i like it. i reccomended. the seller was excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Murillo Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to be able ot put the pieces together like the picture
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. My kids will play with the angry birds/pigs pieces for hours. The AT-AT guy is not easy to put together. My 8 year old wasn't able to get the pieces to stand up on the back by himself and asked me to set it up. I tried for quite awhile before getting frustrated and giving up. The pieces don't stand up on the AT-AT walker's back. With the slightest breeze any pieces that you were able to get to stand, fall over and you have to put them all up again. If you are just looking for the characters, then I'd recommend it, but at a much lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Nephew is happy
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves Angry Birds and Star Wars, so this is a perfect game that gets him off of his iPhone and actually engaged in tangible toys. He loves this game!
customer_reviews.author: Melaina G

customer_reviews.title: Not as thrilling as thought.
customer_reviews.text: The child recieving this was not as thrilled with it as I thought he would be. Not as exciting as other games.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W McKissen

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find a good toy for a Birthday gift for my 5 year old nephew. He plays with it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Amie Lemay

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: our son really likes this. enjoys putting all his pigs on top and shooting off with birds
customer_reviews.author: RMW

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 5 yr old
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this- he doesn't 'play' as the game is supposed to be played, but loves all the little figures and building the AT AT Walker, then knocking everything down. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Bad design and too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to keep parts together while setting up. Kept toppling over before even getting it set up and that's with adults doing it!!! BAD DESIGN and way too expensive. Grandsons 9 and 6 yrs of age got very frustrated and didn't want to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Depue (Grandpa)

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Not made very well for the price. Just the product. It's a bunch of plastic pieces that get knocked down. But that was on the wish list.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cole

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My six year old loves this, but keeping it together can be kind of a chore, especially the head portion. Otherwise they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Master Chief

customer_reviews.title: Granson loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the toys my grandson wanted for his birthday. He loves it. It arrived in a day or two which was great.
customer_reviews.author: Eudice

customer_reviews.title: Angry Bird Star Wars AT AT Walker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his birthday because it was something he specifically asked for and we had other Angry Bird games that he enjoyed. I was thouroughly disappointed by the product. While it came with many figures, It was much smaller than I had anticipated and extremely difficult for me to put together let alone my son. The pieces do not stack together well and it is very hard to balance. On top of this, there is really no game play aspect. You stack it up and try to knock it down. My son played with it once and hasn't asked to get it out again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Nation

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together at first!
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to put together at first! Instructions are not great. However, once you figure out out it is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: GuyInOK

customer_reviews.title: grandson gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson adores angry birds and loves his new AT AT Attack. he uses all the games together and has a great time.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Proctor

customer_reviews.title: My son loves Angry Birds
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Angry Birds, so he was very happy when he got this gift for Christmas. He has a lot of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amatsya

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this games its very entertaining and fun to watch him play great for the family its a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: STAR

customer_reviews.title: Angry birds review
customer_reviews.text: My son loves angry birds so this was perfect for him and he loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew was excited with this toy! Seemed easy to put together & the kids had fun playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fox

customer_reviews.title: loved it! And so did his two friends who ...
customer_reviews.text: My son, 5yrs, loved it! And so did his two friends who received it as a birthday presents. So well-priced.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Ryan

customer_reviews.text: I don't get it. Then, I'm an adult, maybe I'm not supposed to. My nephew was very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. DALFONSO

customer_reviews.title: i loved!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What to say about angry birds games star wars, my nephew is happy with each of the toys and impresses me how to send it care of every detail and excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: KARRLA CAN

customer_reviews.title: Overall Quality and Durability is Poor
customer_reviews.text: This item is made of, what I consider, poor quality plastic. As of today, one week past Christmas, this toy is no longer useable. A couple pieces are cracked and there are two others that are 'stuck' together at the joints/tabs where they are to be assembled together - but they are stuck together in an incorrect way. My son has given up on it. The game looked like a good idea, but the overall quality and durability is poor.
customer_reviews.author: MKfromPA

customer_reviews.title: Not as fun as reviews indicated.
customer_reviews.text: Not as fun as reviews indicate. Bought this 3 weeks ago for 8 year old son. He's played it once.
customer_reviews.author: KellyZ1009

customer_reviews.title: Angry birds Star wars AT AT
customer_reviews.text: my 7 yr old likes it, but I think it would be funner if it had more than one launcher. I think it is a bit over priced also
customer_reviews.author: T. Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: smaller and cheaper birds
customer_reviews.text: We have the Death Star product and its good. This one, and all others Ive seen since, they have made the little birds and pigs smaller and cheaper- extreme choking hazard- you couldnt find a worse size item for your baby or toddlers mouth.
customer_reviews.author: steve lahti

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous for the money
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this for Christmas and was thrilled to receive it but hasn't touched it since Christmas morning. It gets boring really fast and I think is very overpriced for a bunch of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime S.

customer_reviews.title: great.
customer_reviews.text: my son loved this! it was a Christmas gift, and his favorite toy. we had a ton of fun playing this game.
customer_reviews.author: StephxCouture

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for any kid that loves Angry
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old got this for Christmas and its a huge hit! The perfect gift for any kid that loves Angry Birds
customer_reviews.author: krista corbett

customer_reviews.title: He was estatic!
customer_reviews.text: You should have seen the look on his face when he opened this present up. My son 7yrs old, has the app on the kindle so to get the actual game was really nice. He loves building it up and then watching it fall.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. A little hard to put together in that it keeps falling. Otherwise, my son loves it..especially the characters that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: abai2297

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I was able to order the product quickly and it arrived before Christmas. A wonderful process that was both quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: John Kerekes

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Arrive promptly and my son was so happy. The part appear to be ver durable. He played with it all afternoon!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

product_meta.title: Angry Birds Star Wars AT-AT Attack Battle Game
product_meta.description:
The Angry Birds Star Wars app comes to life! This line of Hasbro toys captures all the launching and destroying fun of the app in physical form and features your favorite Star Wars characters re-imagined as high-flying Angry Birds and villainous pigs! Stack, launch, and destroy with the AT-AT Attack Battle Game, which includes 21 blocks to create the massive, signature AT-AT, a Lightsaber launcher and 12 Angry Birds Star Wars figures - including two that are exclusive to this set! Players can also unlock Angry Birds Star Wars in-app content with a special code in each pack.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
copy pending, copy pending, copy pending, copy pending, copy pending, copy pending, copy pending, copy pending, copy pending, copy pending
feature_bullets: AT-AT Attack Battle Game brings the Angry Birds Star Wars app to life
The battle game captures all the launching and destroying fun of the app
Featuring your favorite Star Wars characters re-imagined as high-flying Angry Birds and villainous pigs
Luke Skywalker (Echo Base Gear) bird figure and AT-AT Commander pig figure are only available in this set
Set includes 12 figures, 21 blocks, 8 AT-AT pieces, 1 Lightsaber launcher and instructions
